summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 MAZDA B-SERIES TRUCK. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER SENT A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V499000 (AIR BAGS). THE CONTACT HAD BEEN WAITING FOR OVER TWO YEARS FOR THE RECALL REMEDY TO BECOME AVAILABLE. THE DEALER AND THE MANUFACTURER WERE NOT CONTACTED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
